name: Sunfall (Silvere01)
description:
My game for 2020 Unreal Spring Jam. Joined the gamejam with 35 hours left until deadline as I missed the start. I think I can be proud to have done this with such limited time :) Great experience.

Team Name
Silvere01

Modifier categories:
ARMY OF ONE

List of used content:

Marketplace:
InfinityBladeIceLands (Meshes)
Horror Engine (Only Torch  mesh)
AdvancedMagicFX12 (Particle for eye statue)
AdvancedMagicFX13(Tornado Particles)
ParticleText Plugin
Some UE4 engine stuff, like the fire sound. 


Quixel:
Chunky Snow Texture
Footprint Textures: 1x 3 legged, 1x single foot, both snow

Volumetric Fog based on GDCLearning youtube series
